title: Urban Gardening Basics
description: Learn how to grow your own food in small spaces.
detailed_description: Discover the joys of growing your own fresh produce, even with limited space. This comprehensive workshop covers everything from selecting the right containers and soil mixes to choosing the best crops for your balcony or patio. You'll learn essential techniques for watering, fertilizing, and pest management to ensure a bountiful harvest.
learning_outcomes: Choosing the right plants for small spaces

title: DIY Natural Soap Making
description: Create your own chemical-free soaps at home.
detailed_description: Dive into the art of cold-process soap making. In this hands-on session, you will learn how to formulate your own soap recipes using natural oils, butters, and essential oils. We will cover safety precautions, lye handling, and design techniques like swirling and layering. You'll take home a batch of your own handmade soap!
learning_outcomes: Using essential oils and natural colorants

title: Composting 101
description: Turn your kitchen scraps into nutrient-rich soil.
detailed_description: Stop throwing away valuable organic matter! Learn the science of composting and how to turn kitchen scraps and yard waste into 'black gold' for your garden. We'll explore different composting methods, including backyard bins, vermicomposting (worm bins), and bokashi, helping you find the perfect system for your lifestyle.

title: Upcycling Old Clothes
description: Give new life to your old wardrobe items.
detailed_description: Don't toss those old clothes! Learn creative ways to repair, alter, and transform your wardrobe. From simple mending and embroidery to complete reconstruction, this workshop will teach you sewing techniques to extend the life of your garments and express your unique style sustainably.

title: Hydroponics for Beginners
description: Grow plants without soil using water-based systems.
detailed_description: Explore the fascinating world of soil-less gardening. Learn about different hydroponic systems like Kratky, DWC (Deep Water Culture), and NFT (Nutrient Film Technique). We'll build a simple system together and discuss nutrient solutions, pH management, and lighting requirements for indoor growing.

title: Zero Waste Kitchen
description: Tips and tricks for a plastic-free kitchen.
detailed_description: Transform your kitchen into a sustainable haven. Learn practical strategies to reduce food waste, eliminate single-use plastics, and shop in bulk. We'll demonstrate how to make your own beeswax wraps, produce bags, and natural kitchen cleaners.

title: Natural Dyeing Workshop
description: Dye fabrics using plants and food scraps.
detailed_description: Unlock the colors of nature! Learn how to extract beautiful pigments from flowers, leaves, roots, and kitchen scraps like onion skins and avocado pits. We'll cover fabric preparation (mordanting), dye bath preparation, and different dyeing techniques like bundle dyeing and shibori.

title: Vertical Gardening
description: Maximize your space with vertical planting techniques.
detailed_description: Short on space? Grow up! This workshop explores creative vertical gardening solutions for balconies, walls, and fences. Learn about trellis systems, living walls, pocket planters, and choosing the right plants for vertical growth. Perfect for urban dwellers.

title: Energy Saving at Home
description: Reduce your energy bills and carbon footprint.
detailed_description: Learn practical and cost-effective ways to improve your home's energy efficiency. We'll discuss insulation, draft proofing, efficient appliances, smart home technology, and behavioral changes that can significantly lower your electricity bills and environmental impact.

title: Beekeeping for Beginners
description: Introduction to urban beekeeping.
detailed_description: A comprehensive introduction to the fascinating world of honeybees. Learn about bee biology, hive hierarchy, equipment needed, and how to start and maintain your own hive. We'll also cover bee-friendly gardening and the importance of pollinators in our ecosystem.

title: Candle Making
description: Make soy wax candles with essential oils.
detailed_description: Learn the art of making clean-burning soy wax candles. We'll explore different waxes, wicks, and fragrance loads. You'll blend your own custom scents using essential oils and pour your own container candles to take home. Perfect for gifts or self-care.

title: Permaculture Principles
description: Designing sustainable human settlements.
detailed_description: An intensive introduction to permaculture design. Learn how to observe nature and apply its patterns to design sustainable systems for food production, housing, and community. We'll cover zones, sectors, guilds, and water management principles.

title: Container Gardening
description: Growing vegetables in pots and containers.
detailed_description: No garden? No problem! Learn how to grow a productive vegetable garden in pots, planters, and window boxes. We'll discuss soil mixes, watering needs, and the best varieties of vegetables, herbs, and fruits for container culture.

title: Eco-Friendly Cleaning
description: Make your own non-toxic cleaning products.
detailed_description: Ditch the harsh chemicals and make your own effective, natural cleaning products for pennies. We'll use simple ingredients like vinegar, baking soda, castile soap, and essential oils to create all-purpose cleaners, laundry detergent, and scrubs.

title: Water Conservation
description: Strategies for saving water in the garden and home.
detailed_description: Water is a precious resource. Learn how to capture rainwater, install greywater systems, and design drought-tolerant landscapes (xeriscaping). We'll also cover simple home retrofits to reduce water consumption.

title: Mushroom Cultivation
description: Grow gourmet mushrooms at home.
detailed_description: Demystify the art of growing mushrooms. Learn low-tech methods for cultivating oyster mushrooms on coffee grounds, straw, and logs. We'll cover sterile technique, spawn production, and fruiting conditions.

title: Furniture Restoration
description: Repair and refinish wooden furniture.
detailed_description: Bring your tired furniture back to life. Learn how to strip old finish, repair scratches and dents, stain, and seal wood. We'll also cover basic upholstery techniques for chair seats.
requirements: Small piece of furniture to work on

title: Solar Cooking
description: Build and use a solar oven.
detailed_description: Harness the power of the sun to cook delicious meals. We'll build simple box cookers and panel cookers using recycled materials. Then, we'll put them to the test by cooking a communal lunch!

title: Herbal Medicine
description: Basic home remedies using common herbs.
detailed_description: Empower yourself with natural healing. Learn to identify, harvest, and process medicinal herbs. We'll make herbal teas, tinctures, salves, and syrups for common ailments like colds, stress, and skin issues.

title: Paper Making
description: Recycle waste paper into beautiful handmade sheets.
detailed_description: Turn your junk mail and office scraps into unique, handmade paper. Learn the process of pulping, molding, and couching. We'll experiment with adding botanicals, seeds, and dyes to create textured and colorful papers.
